tidbits.title: Guarani Culture
tidbits.description: Paraguay embraces its Guarani culture, seen in language, music like polka and harp melodies, and traditional arts and crafts.

tidbits.title: Natural Wonders
tidbits.description: The country features natural wonders like the Pantanal, Jesuit missions, and the Gran Chaco, offering diverse wildlife and landscapes.

tidbits.title: Yerba Mate Tradition
tidbits.description: Paraguayans have a strong yerba mate tradition, with the herbal drink being an integral part of social gatherings and daily life.
